main event: A witness driving in Riverside, California observed an object through the rear view mirror, but when turned to show it to his parents, the object was gone.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 3 AM and lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was observed from inside a vehicle., The weather conditions at the time were cloudy., The object made no sound during the sighting., The witness had previously seen a similar object in the sky around February 1962.
witness description: The witness was driving with family but details on the witness's identity are redacted.
